name: HypertensiveChronicKidneyDisease
title: Hypertensive Chronic Kidney Disease
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of hypertensive chronic kidney disease.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis for hypertensive chronic kidney disease.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
